training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com opt
training_data.description: Submits a geometry optimization job using Gaussian on the shared server with the test project settings and input.com file.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s xz gaussian -p test -f input.com ts
training_data.description: Submits a transition state search job using Gaussian on server xz.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com scan -c [[4,17]] -s 0.1 -n 10
training_data.description: Submits a relaxed PES scan job along the bond between atoms 4 and 17 for 10 steps with 0.1Ã… increment per step.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com sp
training_data.description: Submits a single-point energy calculation job.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com irc
training_data.description: Submits an intrinsic reaction coordinate (IRC) job.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com -c 1 -m 2 -l test_charge_multiplicity opt
training_data.description: Modifies the charge to +1 and multiplicity to 2 before submitting a geometry optimization job.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f crest_conformers.xyz -c 0 -m 1 crest -j opt
training_data.description: Optimizes all conformers from a CREST-generated conformers file using Gaussian.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f md.traj -c 0 -m 1 saopt -x 0.2 -n 10 -g seq
training_data.description: Optimizes the 10 lowest energy unique structures from the last 20% of an MD Simulated Annealing trajectory.

training_data.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f irc.log dias -i 5-17 -n 10
training_data.description: Runs a distortion-interaction/activation-strain (DI-AS) job for fragment 1 with atoms 5-17 at every 10 steps along the IRC.

training_data.command:
chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f test.com -l user_defined_job userjob -r 'mnr functional/basis solvent etc' -a 'B 1 2 F
A 1 2 3 F'
training_data.description: Runs a user-defined Gaussian job with a custom route and appended input information.

output.command: chemsmart sub -s shared gaussian -p test -f input.com -c 1 -m 2 opt
